meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michelle Martin Shawn Selby Gary Roberts Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6588.

td.p: Michelle Martin, a journalist from Chicago, Illinois
Shawn Selby, an adjunct history professor from Canton, Ohio
Gary Roberts, a defense consultant from Suffolk, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,601)

tr.td: DR. SEUSS ON THE 11 O'CLOCK NEWS
BANKRUPT!
ON "EDGE"
POP CULTURE
INTERNATIONAL AFFAIRS
BLENDER SETTINGS

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
